title: Gradle Boot Camp
description: A quick and practical guide to Gradle

chapters.title: Introduction
chapters.description: A brief introduction to build tools in general and where Gradle fits in all this.

chapters.title: Setup
chapters.description: The subsequent chapters rely on Gradle to be set up and require some additional third party programs.  This section provides a step by step guide about how to install the required software.

chapters.title: Fundamentals
chapters.description: Covers the fundamentals of Gradle, assuming that the reader has little knowledge of Gradle.

chapters.title: Java Application
chapters.description: Takes the Gradle fundamental concepts and applies them to create a Java application that takes advantage of Gradle's abilities to automate nuance tasks.

chapters.title: Multi-Project Application
chapters.description: A more advanced example of how Gradle can be used with large applications, comprising smaller projects.
